aka: The Amazing World of Aviation - Past, Present & Future
this_title: The Amazing World of Aviation Season 1
trans_title: 神秘世界之航空 第一季
The Amazing World of Aviation - Past, Present & Future
introduction: When the Wright brothers successfully took to the sky in 1903, the world paid attention. Civil aviation has since developed into a multi-billion dollar industry. We look at the incredible history and development of civil aviation in this series. From ailed beginnings through to modern marvels such as the Boeing 787, we present 13 themed episodes suitable for all audiences.S1 E1 Take Off, The Beginning of FlightS1 E2 Barnstormers & Record BreakersS1 E3 Bi Plane to MonoplaneS1 E4 The AirlinerS1 E5 The SeaplaneS1 E6 The Jet AgeS1 E7 Highways in The SkyS1 E8 Airports & Flight AttendantsS1 E9 Supersonic FlightS1 E10 The Modern AgeS1 E11 Long Haul AircraftS1 E12 The Giants of the SkyS1 E13 Air Travel TomorrowProducer: Film Ideas, Inc.
chinese_title: 神秘世界之航空 第一季
foreign_title: The Amazing World of Aviation Season 1
